title: DaveF
author: DaveF
content: Use code CUSTODY1 for a 35% discount.Regular link: https://shop.keyst.one/ Get me a commission by using this link:Â  https://shop.keyst.one/?rfsn=6975713.f0c1cf7&utm_source=refersion&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_campaign=6975713.f0c1cf7Keystone has fully open source firmware: https://github.com/KeystoneHQThey are active on twitter and other social media.https://blog.keyst.one/https://twitter.com/KeystoneWallethttps://t.co/9TAwBJwfhRThey have nor been online here in a while, but you can ping out to them other places and get a quick response.-Dave

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: This is the biggest discount so far among the hardware wallet brands. Their web shop seems quite slow at the moment. Maybe it's getting more attention than usual because people are taking advantage of discounted prices.It seems the prices will be further decreased. When you open the main page, you are welcomed with a huge banner that says there will be a 40% discount starting from tomorrow. It takes you to their Twitter feed and from there you need to join their Discord server to get more info.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: DaveF on November 16, 2022, 02:38:32 PMUse code CUSTODY1 for a 35% discount.This is a really a great deal for Keystone Pro model, using discount code price is only $110, that is amazing price compared with current prices of all hardware wallet.For $110 you are getting airgapped device with rechargeable battery, and option to install Bitcoin-only firmware (not possible to go back to multi-coin firmware).Please consider writing your own review with pros and cons, after you receive and test this device.

comments.author: n0nce
comments.body: This discount pushes the price of their base model device under $80, which is impressive.Sadly, the hardware is not open-source, but the firmware is and you get an air-gapped device. Sounds like good value to me, but I'd have to try it for myself.I'll think about it and maybe order one..

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: n0nce on November 17, 2022, 04:35:36 PMThis discount pushes the price of their base model device under $80, which is impressive.Sadly, the hardware is not open-source, but the firmware is and you get an air-gapped device. Sounds like good value to me, but I'd have to try it for myself.That is a good price, but few bucks more for Pro version is absolutely worth it, battery is much better and rechargeable, there is fingerprint sensor, and it has Anti-Tamper Self-Destruct Mechanism.I am not sure how good that anti-tamper mechanism is, but it's better to have it if you can, and Essential version doesn't have it at all.Now they started with even bigger 40% discount, but you need to do some twitter activity and join their discord, maybe you can even write few words about Passport wallet https://nitter.poast.org/KeystoneWallet/status/1593272854887378944#m

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: The offer is good and I don't expect any other wallet provider to compete with it, but they don't ship worldwide, and using package forwarding service is not really worth it.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Getting a better hardware wallet at pretty much the price of Nano S is a sweet offer (btw, it's ending in some 4.5h).Unfortunately I see no resellers in EU and shipping and import taxes can become disappointing.But yeah, the Americans should definitely go for it (and I agree with previous posts, at this offer I would really consider the Pro version).

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on November 21, 2022, 08:09:12 AMThe offer is good and I don't expect any other wallet provider to compete with it, but they don't ship worldwide, and using package forwarding service is not really worth it.I can confirm they are shipping worldwide, and they are also using Amazon shop for Europe and United States; Asia is covered from Hong Kong/China I think.If Keystone website or Amazon is not offering your country for delivery, than you can try contacting them on their telegram group @KeystoneWallet or their owner @LixinLiu (their twitter account is also active).Note that I am not advertising Kesystone products in any way, just trying to provide correct information, so seller on Amazon is called KeystoneHQ and this is their official store:https://www.amazon.com/stores/KEYSTONE/page/0360EBE5-E20C-45DC-836C-59573EAE62F5

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: n0nce on November 23, 2022, 12:53:02 AMBy the way, the CUSTODY1 code is still working right now. Right now, you get an automatic 30% discount as soon as you add one of their hardware wallets to your cart. When I went to check out and applied the CUSTODY1 discount code, the price dropped some more, the site seems to have accepted the code, but I got a pop-up notice saying "Enter a valid discount code". Removing the code and adding it again got rid of the error message, but it makes me wonder whether or not it will work or not. There must be a reason why it popped up in the first place.
